name: Slime Block
description: Hello! in this game "Slime Block" you need to beat the platformer with a score 950. TIPS: if you look some eye, you need to going to the that eye. If the color of the eye is change, you get a checkpoint from the eye. CONTROLS:W A S D to move. Press SPACE to jump.  and done! You need to beat a platformer. Win with score 950 = You beat this game. Win wihout score 950 = You not beat this game.
